review: Apparently, my internet speed is not fast enough.  Plus I did not know that I would have to play my router as close to the product as possible to maximize reception.  This is (in my view) unsightly.  I have to return the product.
author: Sandy Buerle

review: Worked exactly as advertised.  Could not be more pleased.
author: Ean Sullivan

review: Wish we would have bought it sooner!
author: Sandra Simons

review: I did get it to work.  WiFi reception is a bit tricky given that the "stick" is behind the TV, which is in a build-in enclosure.
author: JJS "JJS"

review: Would have received 5 stars if I didn't have to add power to the HDMI stick.  I must not have read the description well enough.  Not an easy install if you are running cords through the wall. Now I have a power cord running up to a mounted tv.  Blah  I do like the service however
author: John Parrish

review: My son and I love it.  Nice to have the Apps I want on my screen television without having to go through the blu ray player.
author: Natasha Williamson

review: This device is definitely for someone who want to turn their regular flat screen into a smart TV.  One thing it doesn't show here is the power cable you need to attach to it so make sure you have a power source near by.  On top of the regular Netflix and amazon prime setup, there is a series of other media sources but on top of that you have music as well as video games which I didn't see that coming.  Overall its more than I expected.  But its not as good as the amazon fire TV.
author: Gift Card "New Godzilla"

review: Yes I got it.  It is great.  Best thing since sliced bread.
author: cashemac
